QuestData.Title: A Family Divided
QuestData.Description: The children you see here were all rescued from Taurajo when the fighting started. I'm trying to track down their parents.$B$BOne of the refugees you rescued from the quilboar recognized the strongest child as belonging to Kirge and Mawre Sternhorn. Moreover, he said Kirge was camped at the Fields of Blood, just north of the Taurajo massacre site.$B$B$n, please go there and tell Kirge Sternhorn that his child is alive and well!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Kirge Sternhorn at Vendetta Point in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Kirge Sternhorn at Vendetta Point in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kirge listens intently and then falls to one knee.>$B$BAlive! My boy still lives! Praise to the earthmother, I still have a son.$B$B<Kirge composes himself.>$B$B$C, my boy's mother didn't make it out of Taurajo alive. I will avenge her death, even if it means my son grows up without either of his parents.
